tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE expenses_and_revenues (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  description TEXT,
  amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  type ENUM('expense', 'revenue'),
  date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE farm_expenses (
  farm_expense_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  farm_id INT,
  expense_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (farm_id) REFERENCES farms(farm_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (expense_id) REFERENCES expenses(expense_id)
);
